data.title: Element: Media Outlets
data.meta_description: Official Web Site of the Virginia Department of Transportation
data.text:
Media Outlets

Status:

Existing

Definition:

The Media element represents the information systems that provide traffic reports, travel conditions, and other transportation-related news services to the traveling public through radio,TV, and other media.

Stakeholder:

Media

Architecture Flow Diagrams

which include Media Outlets:

Media Outlets City of Danville TMC

Media Outlets SWR Local Public Safety Mobile Centers

Media Outlets Tourism and Travel Service Information Sources

Media Outlets VDOT Lynchburg District Public Information Office

Architecture Flows

to/from the Media Outlets:

Media Outlets City of Danville TMC

external reports

Media Outlets Tourism and Travel Service Information Sources

external reports

Media Outlets VDOT Lynchburg District Public Information Office

external reports

City of Danville TMC Media Outlets

incident information for media

road network conditions

traveler information for media

SWR Local Public Safety Mobile Centers Media Outlets

incident information for media

Tourism and Travel Service Information Sources Media Outlets

traveler information for media

VDOT Lynchburg District Public Information Office Media Outlets

incident information for media

National ITS Architecture Subsystems

mapped to the Media Outlets:

Media Terminator

National ITS Architecture Services

associated with Media Outlets:

APTS08 - Transit Traveler Information -- (Graphic)

ATIS01 - Broadcast Traveler Information -- (Graphic)

ATMS06 - Traffic Information Dissemination -- (Graphic)

ATMS08 - Traffic Incident Management System -- Graphic 1 2

EM10 - Disaster Traveler Information -- (Graphic)

MC04 - Weather Information Processing and Distribution -- (Graphic)

MC10 - Maintenance and Construction Activity Coordination -- (Graphic)

National ITS Architecture Functional Requirements

associated with Media Outlets:

none
